title: When you are Darius, and you are trying to figure out if your dunk will do enough damage yet

replies.body: Meanwhile Cho just waits for the batsignal to appear.

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PAdpN95U,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-13T17:07:10.944+0000)

Oh you just press r amd do half there hp anyway
their*

Fixed it.
dont forget {{champion:238}}
As if that all is necessary. The target will die from the bleed anyways.
Then you don't get the reset, which in turn lowers your bleed's total damage

But you wont be able to do it straight after :(

And then no pentadunk :((((
Vonler has obciously never played Darius

You don't have to play a champion to know its mechanics...

I'm well aware of the reset mechanic on his ult. And I know that it's quite irrelevant in 1v1 situations (which I was mainly refering to with my earlier post).

> [{quoted}](name=Vonler,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PAdpN95U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-13T12:50:04.031+0000)
>
> As if that all is necessary. The target will die from the bleed anyways.

well yea, but you wont get an ult reset

... Isn't it displayed as the giant axe over someone's head? I thought that similar mechanics were in place for similar mechanics, such as Cho'Gath being able to Feast someone to death, Zed's Death Mark, etc.
The giant axe just means that he has 5 stacks of hemorrhage on them, and will do maximum damage. It does not say whether that daamge is enough to kill the person.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PAdpN95U,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-13T16:47:51.814+0000)
>
> The giant axe just means that he has 5 stacks of hemorrhage on them, and will do maximum damage. It does not say whether that daamge is enough to kill the person.

And in the end the damage is always magically enough to kill you.

Is it too early for you? Swing and a miss
Just ask yourself. "Do they have 5 hemorrhage stacks?" If the answer is yes. Then insta kill. If no Dunk anyway because f*** it your {{champion:122}}  anyway.
